ISSUE.TITLE: Line 836 of ProductService.cs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.4 Steps to reproduce the problem: for querying products by warehouse, there might be a mistake in the query at line 836. **Current code**: pwi => pwi.Id == warehouseId && pwi.ProductId == p.Id **Correction:**: pwi => pwi.WarehouseId == warehouseId && pwi.ProductId == p.Id

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5866 Fix products search with multiple warehouses (#5760)
